name: AI-Powered Drug Repurposing Data Analytics Platform
description: Revolutionized drug repurposing with an intelligent data analytics platform that accepts natural language queries, translates them into technical queries, and presents relevant molecular data in analytical dashboards.
challenge: Traditional drug repurposing processes were inefficient, time-consuming, and required extensive manual data analysis, leading to high research costs and slower drug discovery.
solution: Developed intelligent data analytics platform with natural language interface
Automated translation of natural queries to technical database queries
Created analytical dashboards for molecular data visualization
Enabled rapid analysis of drug-disease relationships

impact.accuracyImprovement: 30% increase in drug repurposing prediction accuracy
